ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD says fail to the Chief, and takes a terrifying stab at Halloween humor! MAD also spoofs MySpace, religious video games, pirates and Mel Gibson! Plus, Spy vs. Spy and the Strip Club!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:08:58. [Issue ID 129315]
